products.name: DANCE
products.desc: If Dance is your passion or hobby, then this place is for you. We invite you to be a part of D1. Join our Basic course or ADVANCE CERTIFICATION course or PROFESSIONAL DIPLOMA course.
products.desc2: At D1 we have a team of versatile dancers who teach and perform various dance styles like - HipHop, Contemporary, Bollywood, Western, Folk, etc. Let's take a quick look at what we do: We train group performers, we train kids and adults for various Competitions and Reality Shows. We also conduct training programs and workshops for students and Dance Teachers. Our staff also judges various competitions.

products.name: GYMNASTICS
products.desc: Attain that balance,strength,flexibility that you've always wished for.Checkout our Gymnastics course
products.desc2: You'll be taught under the supervision of trained and experienced staff.

products.name: ZUMBA
products.desc: This course is perfect for your daily routine workout with some cool dance moves...!

products.name: FITNESS
products.desc: Don't procrastinate. You need to workout. Join our daily Fitness course Click for more details.

products.name: EVENTS
products.desc: We also manage and arrange all kinds of events. Checkout the page for more.

products.name: ART
